title: Sequential Task Design Based on the SSARC Model for Improving Spoken Portuguese Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating immediately applicable conversational skills for pre-service/in-service teachers, utilizing basic smartphone recording/playback functions

learning_goals: Learners achieve a 20% improvement in grammatical accuracy in spoken Portuguese through three-stage tasks based on the SSARC model
Learners increase syntactic complexity (e.g., conjunction usage) by 15% when communicating orally in complex social situations
Learners improve speaking fluency (syllables per minute) by 10% using planning strategies under time constraints

resources: Portuguese colloquial speech sample audio files
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
